# RcppChoose

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

RcppChoose is an example of project that combines two parts, 
C++ code ([libChoose/](libChoose/) and R package [rpackage/](rpackage/).

## Installation


``` r
library(devtools)
load_all("RcppChoose/rpackage/")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to choose `k` out of `n` numbers.

```{r example}
library(RcppChoose)

rcpp_choose(40, 20)
rcpp_nchoosek_sample(1000, 500, 100)
```
